data.comment: The match has started at Toyota Stadium.
Ismail Elfath awards the away team a throw-in.
In the minute 5, Ismail Elfath signals a free kick to Dallas in their own half.
Harold Mosquera for Dallas is whistled offside.
Ismail Elfath signals a Dallas throw-in in Colorado's half.
In the minute 7, Dallas drives forward and Michael Barrios gets in a shot. Without netting, however.
Dallas have been awarded a corner by Ismail Elfath.
Dallas's Andres Ricaurte gets in a shot on goal at Toyota Stadium. But the effort is unsuccessful.
In the minute 7, Corner awarded to Dallas.
Dallas needs to be cautious. Colorado have an attacking throw-in.
Colorado are coming forward and Cole Bassett gets in a strike, it misses the target, however.
In the minute 9, Goal kick for Dallas at Toyota Stadium.
Ismail Elfath awards Colorado a goal kick.
Throw-in for Dallas in the half of Colorado.
In the minute 13, So close for Colorado as Jonathan Lewis's shot comes back off the post.
Colorado have a dangerous throw-in.
Younes Namli (Colorado) gets in a strike but the shot is blocked by a defender.
In the minute 15, Colorado have been awarded a corner by Ismail Elfath.
Free kick for Dallas in their own half.
Free kick for Dallas in the half of Colorado.
In the minute 17, In Frisco a free kick has been awarded the away team.
Kellyn Acosta gets his shot on target but fails to score for Colorado.
Corner awarded to Colorado.
In the minute 21, Colorado push upfield and Diego Rubio gets his head to the ball. The attempt is cleared by an alert Dallas defence.
Ball goes out of play for a Colorado goal kick.
Dallas have a goal kick.
In the minute 25, Can Colorado get the ball into an attacking position from this throw-in in Dallas's half?
In Frisco, Dallas push forward quickly but are pulled up for offside.
Dallas awarded a free kick in their own half.
In the minute 29, A throw-in for the away team on the opposite half.
Colorado have been awarded a corner by Ismail Elfath.
Corner awarded to Colorado.
In the minute 32, In Frisco, Tanner Tessmann of Dallas is presented with a shooting opportunity. But the strike is blocked by the covering defence.
Dallas are pushing forward but Michael Barrios's finish is wide of the goal.
It's a goal kick for the away team in Frisco.
In the minute 33, Dallas to take a throw-in in Colorado territory.
Ismail Elfath signals a free kick to Dallas.
Ismail Elfath signals a free kick to Colorado in their own half.
In the minute 35, Colorado awarded a free kick in their own half.
Dallas push forward at Toyota Stadium and Harold Mosquera gets in a strike. This is blocked, however, by a determined Colorado defence.
Free kick Colorado.
In the minute 39, Ismail Elfath waits before resuming play because Diego Rubio for Colorado is still down.
Diego Rubio for Colorado is back on the field again.
Goal! Dallas have got their heads in front thanks to a Harold Mosquera strike.
In the minute 41, Michael Barrios with an assist there.
Goal kick for Dallas at Toyota Stadium.
Free kick for Colorado in their own half.
In the minute 44, Thiago Santos for Dallas has been booked by Ismail Elfath and receives a first yellow card.
Corner awarded to Colorado.
1 minutes of injury time will be added to the 1st half.
In the minute 45, Ismail Elfath signals a free kick to Dallas in their own half.
The first-half is over.
The second-half has just kicked-off.
In the minute 46, Dallas's Michael Barrios misses with an attempt on goal.
It's a goal kick for the away team in Frisco.
Dallas pushes forward through Michael Barrios, whose finish on goal is saved.
In the minute 48, Dallas have been awarded a corner by Ismail Elfath.
Corner awarded to Dallas.
Dallas move into a 2-0 lead through a Franco Jara header.
In the minute 49, Great play from Reto Ziegler to set up the goal.
In Frisco a free kick has been awarded the away team.
Colorado awarded a free kick in their own half.
In the minute 52, Ismail Elfath awards Dallas a goal kick.
Diego Rubio is down and play has been interrupted for a few moments.
A throw-in for the home team on the opposite half.
In the minute 53, Dallas to take a throw-in in Colorado territory.
Diego Rubio is back on the pitch.
Can Dallas capitalize from this throw-in deep inside Colorado's half?
In the minute 54, Throw-in for Colorado at Toyota Stadium.
In Frisco Colorado drive forward through Cole Bassett. His shot is on target but it's saved.
Colorado have a goal kick.
In the minute 57, Goal! Harold Mosquera extends Dallas's lead to 3-0.
Free kick for Dallas in their own half.
Andre Shinyashiki is replacing Diego Rubio for the away team.
In the minute 61, The away team have replaced Cole Bassett with Braian Galvan. This is the second substitution made today by Robin Fraser.
Colorado make their third substitution with Nicolas Mezquida replacing Younes Namli.
Andre Shinyashiki keeps the away team in the match by reducing the deficit to 3-1.
In the minute 63, That's a fine assist from Nicolas Mezquida.
Luchi Gonzalez is making the team's first substitution at Toyota Stadium with Brandon Servania replacing Andres Ricaurte.
Ball safe as Dallas is awarded a throw-in in their half.
Can Dallas get the ball into an attacking position from this throw-in in Colorado's half?
In the minute 66, Robin Fraser (Colorado) is making a first substitution, with Nicolas Benezet replacing Jonathan Lewis.
Throw-in for Colorado in their own half.
In the minute 71, Harold Mosquera of Dallas gets in a strike, but is off target.
Ball goes out of play for a Colorado goal kick.
Colorado's Andre Shinyashiki gets in a shot but it is blocked by a Dallas defender.
In the minute 72, Colorado have been awarded a corner by Ismail Elfath.
It's a goal kick for the home team in Frisco.
The away team replace Keegan Rosenberry with Jeremy Kelly.
In the minute 73, Ball goes out of play for a Colorado goal kick.
Dallas have a goal kick.
Fafa Picault is replacing Michael Barrios for Dallas at Toyota Stadium.
In the minute 76, Dallas awarded a throw-in in their own half.
Free kick Colorado.
Dallas have been awarded a corner by Ismail Elfath.
In the minute 78, Goal! Harold Mosquera extends Dallas's lead to 4-1.
Dallas awarded a free kick in their own half.
Throw-in high up the field for Colorado in Frisco.
In the minute 82, Ismail Elfath signals a free kick to Colorado.
Ismail Elfath signals a Colorado throw-in in Dallas's half.
Edwin Cerrillo is on a sub for Thiago Santos for Dallas.
Throw-in for Colorado in the half of Dallas.
In the minute 84, Bressan is replacing Harold Mosquera for Dallas at Toyota Stadium.
Ricardo Pepi is replacing Franco Jara for the home team.
In the minute 85, Throw-in for Colorado close to the penalty box.
Play has been temporarily suspended for attention to Ryan Hollingshead for Dallas who is writhing in pain on the pitch.
Ismail Elfath signals a throw-in for Colorado, close to Dallas's area.
In the minute 88, Dallasâ€™s Ryan Hollingshead is on his feet again at Toyota Stadium.
Colorado's Andre Shinyashiki misses with an attempt on goal.
Ismail Elfath awards Dallas a goal kick.
In the minute 89, Can Dallas get the ball into an attacking position from this throw-in in Colorado's half?
Goal kick for Colorado at Toyota Stadium.
Ismail Elfath signals a Colorado throw-in in Dallas's half.
6 minutes will be added to the 2nd half in Frisco.
It's a goal kick for the home team in Frisco.
Colorado are pushing forward but Nicolas Mezquida's finish is wide of the goal.
Colorado's Jeremy Kelly gets his shot away but it misses the target.
Dallas have a goal kick.
Andre Shinyashiki of Colorado smashes in a shot on target. The keeper saves, though.
Throw-in Dallas.
The second-half is over. The match ends 4-1.
